short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We read your rejections to make you happier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension from shirin anlen and Robert Morrissey.

Read Only is a way to make the application process easier for candidates. We check your emails for rejection letters and use fun gifs and encouraging messages to brighten your day and embiggen your heart. 

Read Only reads your emails in browser and never sends any of your information out.
